Message:
“There’s no way in hell
I’d employ a witch.”

With those words,
my master banished me
from his estate.

After being flung outside,
my entire body aching,

I wonder how many
times this makes...

At the beginning,
everyone is so nice to me,
“You’re such a hard worker,”
they smile.

But the second they
find out I’m a witch...
they change.

I’ve got no allowance...
and barely enough money
for food tomorrow...

Why does being a witch
mean I have to suffer like this...?
